controlAndCollectionSite

Interface IMasterThief

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlAndCollectionSite

    public interface IMasterThief
    Master Thief Interface of ControlAndCollection Site Instance.
    Author:
    Tiago Henriques nmec: 73046; Miguel Oliveira nmec: 72638

    • Method Detail

      • appraiseSit

        int appraiseSit()
        In the Master Thief life cycle, transition between "deciding what to do" and "deciding what to do". The MasterThief decides what to do. If all rooms are empty and all parties are not deployed then the next state will be presenting the report. If there are enough thieves waiting to assemble a party and if the MasterThief has chosen which room to steal and which party to deploy then the next state will be assembling a group. If not, he has to wait for the assault parties to return if there are not enough waiting thieves to assemble a assault party or if there are still deployed assault parties, so the next state will be waiting for group arrival.
        Returns:
        the next state

      • takeARest

        void takeARest()
        In Master Thief life cycle, transition between "deciding what to do" and "waiting for group arrival". CollectCanvas by Masther Thief if any ordinary thief has arrived.

      • collectCanvas

        void collectCanvas()
        In Master Thief life cycle, transition between "waiting for group arrival" and "deciding what to do". Decrease the number of canvas to collect.

      • getRoomToSteal

        int getRoomToSteal()
        Method that returns the room to steal by the Master Thief
        Returns:
        the room to steal by the Master Thief

      • getPartyToDeploy

        int getPartyToDeploy()
        Method that returns the party to deploy by the Master Thief
        Returns:
        the party to deploy by the Master Thief
